name.str: HighCom ceramic side plate, NIJ III++
name.str_pl: HighCom ceramic side plates, NIJ III++

description: A full-cut ballistic plate with slightly clipped corners and a single-curve profile, made with UHMWPE and wrapped in ballistic nylon.  Manufacturer's logo is proudly displayed on the outward-facing side.  This plate is rated for NIJ III++, which means it's been tested to survive at least 3 rounds of high-energy rifle rounds, and then some, approaching the level of NIJ IV protection but not quite qualifying for it.  Plates like this one are intended to be inserted into a plate carrier where it will absorb the energy of multiple rifle rounds before requiring replacement.  This model is a 6″×6″ side panel and can only fit in side panel pouches on a plate carrier.
//material: it is unclear which ceramic this plate uses
based on its thickness, we can surmise that it would probably be alumina
damage_verb: makes a crunch, something has shifted

description: This ceramic plate has been taken out of service by the damage it had suffered.  It will no longer provide significant protection against bullets, and should be replaced or thrown away.
